main event: Boys witnessed a mysterious spherical object with dazzling colors hovering in the sky above Cuyahoga Falls, Ohio, in 1961.
interesting points: The boys reported that the object appeared to be the size of the full moon and was traveling quickly toward the west,The object hovered closely to the ground and then suddenly disappeared,The sighting occurred again around 11 o'clock the same night, causing excitement and terror among the boys,After the encounter, the boys felt sick and were taken to the hospital, with doctors unsure if their symptoms were related to the UFO incident.
witness description: two boys who reported the sighting
